channel.title: Hacker News - English
channel.description: Hacker News articles summarized and translated to English

item.title: Using AI to negotiate a $195k hospital bill down to $33k
item.description:
And then the bills came. I helped my sister-in-law negotiate these down but they weren’t back breakers. Then the hospital bill came: $195k.

Read more

item.title: Our LLM-controlled office robot can't pass butter
item.description:
Eval Butter-Bench: Evaluating LLM Controlled Robots for Practical Intelligence Can LLMs control robots. Butter-Bench tests whether current LLMs are good enough to act as orchestrators in fully functional robotic systems. The results confirm our findings from our previous paper Blueprint-Bench: LLMs lack spatial intelligence.

Read more

item.title: I've been loving Claude Code on the Web
item.description:
I’ve been loving Claude Code on the WebOctober 25, 2025 This week, I’ve been voraciously using Claude Code on the web. Something about this early product is really great. Claude Code on the web feels very solid and dependable.

Read more

item.title: How to build a 747 – A WorldFlight Story
item.description:
Aircraft cockpits have constantly evolved with new metrology and texturing tools to provide some of the premier virtual experiences we have today. They will have to build their 747-200 FROM SCRATCH. With the objective of bringing true cockpit CRM to everyone, Shared Flight provides users with a seamless shared-cockpit experience.

Read more

item.title: SigNoz (YC W21) Is Hiring DevRel Engineers in the US – Open Source O11y Platform
The AirPods Pro 3 flight problem
item.description:
”“I have this issue too. ”“Also having this issue on flight. Apple hasn’t announced any recall or acknowledged the issue to date, and the few Reddit reports show that support calls that led to replacements returned pods that reproduced the issue.

Read more

item.title: Show HN: Dexto – Connect your AI Agents with real-world tools and data
item.description:
Use DEXTO_LOG_TO_CONSOLE=true to log to console when running dexto. Agent Recipes Dexto comes with pre-built agent recipes for common use cases. Install and use them instantly: # List available agents dexto list-agents # Install specific agents dexto install nano-banana-agent podcast-agent coding-agent # Use an agent with one shot prompt dexto --agent nano-banana-agent --mode cli "create a futuristic cityscape with flying cars" dexto --agent podcast-agent --mode cli "generate a podcast intro with two hosts discussing AI" dexto --agent coding-agent --mode cli "create a landing page for a coffee brand inspired by star wars" # Alternatively, start the agent in web UI and put in the prompt yourself dexto --agent nano-banana-agent Available Agents: Coding Agent – Code generation, refactoring, debugging Nano Banana Agent – Advanced image generation and editing using Google's Nano Banana (Gemini 2.

Read more

item.title: HOPL: The Human Only Public License
item.description:
What is this license good for. How effective is this license. note: this license is also published on github Human Only Public License (HOPL) Version 1.
